name: board-buddies
description: A social media platform for board game enthusiasts

Important for MERN Setup.line-10: We use this top-level package.json file to define scripts we can run to control our entire application from the same CLI location.
Important for MERN Setup.line-21: The concurrently hnpm tool allows us to execute two CLI commands at the same time. In this case, we are running the server and client at the same time.

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
